long_description: The REI Belltown jacket offers rain protection for the adventuresome traveler or urban adventurer. It's fully seam-sealed, waterproof and breathable and soft to the touch. Sudden downpour? No problem. 2-layer waterproof, breathable polyester fabric features wicking mesh and taffeta linings for wind and rain protection; all seams are sealed. Windproof to 60 mph. Zip-off hood with side and rear adjustments preserves vision. Waistband drawcord adjusts the fit. The 2-way front zipper features an exterior placket and interior storm flap. Two zip handwarmer pockets, two zip chest pockets and an internal zip chest pocket with a headphone cord port. Chin guard and brushed collar lining; elastic cuffs. The REI Belltown rain jacket has a comfortable, classic fit and long coverage.
short_description: The REI Belltown jacket offers rain protection for the adventuresome traveler or urban adventurer. It's fully seam-sealed, waterproof and breathable and soft to the touch. Sudden downpour? No problem.
